title.native: 範馬刃牙 シーズン２

description:
The second season of Hanma Baki.

In Hanma Baki’s first season, the fighter Baki — the strongest high schooler in the land — trained in a prison against fellow inmates, defeating a giant praying mantis and formidable opponents like Biscuit “Mr. Unchained” Oliva and Jun “Mr. Second” Guevaru. Now, Baki is back and gearing up to battle Pickle, a perfectly preserved prehistoric man so powerful, he once preyed on dinosaurs. If Baki can take down Pickle, his final matchup will be with his all-powerful father, Yujiro Hanma.

(Source: Netflix)
synonyms: Son of Ogre Baki Hanma Season 2

name.native: ゲリー・ストライダム
alternative: キャプテン・ストライダム

node.description:
Keisuke Itagaki is a Japanese manga artist. He is best known for his martial arts series [Grappler Baki](https://anilist.co/manga/41425/Grappler-Baki/) (1991–1999) and its five sequels, which have sold over 100 million volumes. In 1996, he began working on [Garouden](https://anilist.co/manga/37921/Garouden/), an original work by [Baku Yumemakura](https://anilist.co/staff/97026/Baku-Yumemakura). He has also collaborated on the series [Garouden Boy](https://anilist.co/manga/45998/Garouden-Boy/).

Prior to becoming a manga artist, he served 5 years in the 1st Airborne Brigade of the Japan Ground Self-Defense Force. During his service, he practiced amateur boxing and has competed in the National Sports Festival. He also holds a degree in Shorinji Kempo, which he has practiced since he was a teenager. 

He is the father of the famous mangaka [Paru Itagaki](https://anilist.co/staff/121564/).
Originating from [Madhouse](https://anilist.co/studio/11/). He is a member of the Writers Guild of Japan.
Ishikawa Shingo (石川晋吾) is a Japanese animator, animation supervisor, animation director and character designer.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/浦上慶子)

Daughter of [Yasuo Urakami](https://anilist.co/staff/111277/). Sister of [Yasuyuki Urakami](https://anilist.co/staff/144509/).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/吉原俊一郎)

Affiliated with studio Bihou.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/浦上靖之)

Son of [Yasuo Urakami](https://anilist.co/staff/111277/). Brother of [Keiko Urakami](https://anilist.co/staff/162367/).

[Linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/walentyna-an-94b316144/)
Comes from South Korea. In 2015 she started working with SDI Media Polska (now called Iyuno Poland).
Dubbing director and translator at Iyuno Poland.
